title: Provides relief for senior citizens through the school tax relief program
summary: Provides relief for senior citizens through the STAR program, setting the base figure for the exemption for the 2008-2009 school year at seventy-five thousand eight hundred dollars for eligible senior citizens, and the base figure for the basic Star exemption at thirty thousand dollars.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to enhancing the tax relief for senior citizens through the school tax relief program
